verses.verse: Also, <S%H859>thou<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H559>say,<s%> Ye <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the LORD: <S%H3068><s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> <S%H3282>Because<s%> the <S%H341>enemy<s%> hath <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> you, <S%H1889>Aha,<s%> even the <S%H5769>ancient<s%> high <S%H1116>places<s%> <S%H1961>are<s%> ours in possession: <S%H4181><s%>

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> and <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> <S%H3282>Because<s%> <S%H3282><s%> they have made you <S%H8074>desolate,<s%> and swallowed you <S%H7602>up<s%> <S%H853><s%> on every <S%H4480>side,<s%> <S%H5439><s%> that ye might <S%H1961>be<s%> a <S%H4181>possession<s%> unto the <S%H7611>residue<s%> of the <S%H1471>heathen,<s%> and ye are taken <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> the <S%H8193>lips<s%> of <S%H3956>talkers,<s%> and are an <S%H1681>infamy<s%> of the people: <S%H5971><s%>

Therefore, <S%H3651><s%> ye <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%> to the <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> and to the <S%H1389>hills,<s%> to the <S%H650>rivers,<s%> and to the <S%H1516>valleys,<s%> to the <S%H8074>desolate<s%> <S%H2723>wastes,<s%> and to the <S%H5892>cities<s%> that are <S%H5800>forsaken,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H1961>became<s%> a <S%H957>prey<s%> and <S%H3933>derision<s%> to the <S%H7611>residue<s%> of the <S%H1471>heathen<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> are round <S%H4480>about;<s%> <S%H5439><s%>

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> <S%H518>Surely<s%> <S%H3808><s%> in the <S%H784>fire<s%> of my <S%H7068>jealousy<s%> have I <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H7611>residue<s%> of the <S%H1471>heathen,<s%> and <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H123>Idumea,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> have <S%H5414>appointed<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H776>land<s%> into their <S%H4181>possession<s%> with the <S%H8057>joy<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H3824>heart,<s%> with <S%H7589>despiteful<s%> <S%H5315>minds,<s%> <S%H4616>to<s%> cast it <S%H1644>out<s%> for a <S%H957>prey.<s%>

Prophesy <S%H5012><s%> <S%H3651>therefore<s%> <S%H5921>concerning<s%> the <S%H127>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> unto the <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> and to the <S%H1389>hills,<s%> to the <S%H650>rivers,<s%> and to the <S%H1516>valleys,<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> I have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> in my <S%H7068>jealousy<s%> and in my <S%H2534>fury,<s%> <S%H3282>because<s%> ye have <S%H5375>borne<s%> the <S%H3639>shame<s%> of the heathen: <S%H1471><s%>

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> have lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> <S%H853><s%> mine <S%H3027>hand,<s%> <S%H518>Surely<s%> <S%H3808><s%> the <S%H1471>heathen<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> are <S%H4480>about<s%> <S%H5439><s%> you, <S%H1992>they<s%> shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> their <S%H3639>shame.<s%>

But <S%H859>ye,<s%> O <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> ye shall shoot <S%H5414>forth<s%> your <S%H6057>branches,<s%> and <S%H5375>yield<s%> your <S%H6529>fruit<s%> to my <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> they are at <S%H7126>hand<s%> to <S%H935>come.<s%>
For, <S%H3588><s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I am <S%H413>for<s%> you, and I will <S%H6437>turn<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> you, and ye shall be <S%H5647>tilled<s%> and sown: <S%H2232><s%>

And I will <S%H7235>multiply<s%> <S%H120>men<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> you, <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> even <S%H3605>all<s%> of it: and the <S%H5892>cities<s%> shall be <S%H3427>inhabited,<s%> and the <S%H2723>wastes<s%> shall be built: <S%H1129><s%>

And I will <S%H7235>multiply<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> you <S%H120>man<s%> and <S%H929>beast;<s%> and they shall <S%H7235>increase<s%> and bring <S%H6509>fruit:<s%> and I will <S%H3427>settle<s%> you after your old <S%H6927>estates,<s%> and will do <S%H3190>better<s%> unto you than at your <S%H4480>beginnings:<s%> <S%H7221><s%> and ye shall <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

Yea, I will cause <S%H120>men<s%> to <S%H1980>walk<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> you, <S%H853>even<s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> and they shall <S%H3423>possess<s%> thee, and thou shalt <S%H1961>be<s%> their <S%H5159>inheritance,<s%> and thou shalt <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3254>more<s%> <S%H5750>henceforth<s%> <S%H7921>bereave<s%> them of men.

Thus <S%H3541><s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> <S%H3282>Because<s%> they <S%H559>say<s%> unto you, <S%H859>Thou<s%> land devourest <S%H398>up<s%> <S%H120>men,<s%> and hast <S%H1961>bereaved<s%> <S%H7921><s%> thy <S%H1471>nations;<s%>

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> thou shalt <S%H398>devour<s%> <S%H120>men<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H7921>bereave<s%> thy <S%H1471>nations<s%> any <S%H5750>more,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD.<s%>

Neither <S%H3808><s%> will I cause men to <S%H8085>hear<s%> <S%H413>in<s%> thee the <S%H3639>shame<s%> of the <S%H1471>heathen<s%> any <S%H5750>more,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shalt thou <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H2781>reproach<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> any <S%H5750>more,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shalt thou cause thy <S%H1471>nations<s%> to <S%H3782>fall<s%> any <S%H5750>more,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD.<s%>
Moreover the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Son <S%H1121><s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> when the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> their own <S%H127>land,<s%> they <S%H2930>defiled<s%> it by their own <S%H1870>way<s%> and by their <S%H5949>doings:<s%> their <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me as the <S%H2932>uncleanness<s%> of a removed <S%H5079>woman.<s%>

Wherefore I <S%H8210>poured<s%> my <S%H2534>fury<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> them <S%H5921>for<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> they had <S%H8210>shed<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H776>land,<s%> and for their <S%H1544>idols<s%> wherewith they had <S%H2930>polluted<s%> it:

And I <S%H6327>scattered<s%> them among the <S%H1471>heathen,<s%> and they were <S%H2219>dispersed<s%> through the <S%H776>countries:<s%> according to their <S%H1870>way<s%> and according to their <S%H5949>doings<s%> I <S%H8199>judged<s%> them.

And when they <S%H935>entered<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H1471>heathen,<s%> <S%H834>whither<s%> <S%H8033><s%> they <S%H935>went,<s%> they <S%H2490>profaned<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8034>name,<s%> when they <S%H559>said<s%> to them, <S%H428>These<s%> are the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and are gone <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of his <S%H4480>land.<s%> <S%H776><s%>

But I had <S%H2550>pity<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> mine <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8034>name,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> had <S%H2490>profaned<s%> among the <S%H1471>heathen,<s%> <S%H834>whither<s%> <S%H8033><s%> they <S%H935>went.<s%>

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> <S%H559>say<s%> unto the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> this for your <S%H4616>sakes,<s%> O <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H3588>but<s%> <S%H518><s%> for mine <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8034>name's<s%> sake, <S%H834>which<s%> ye have <S%H2490>profaned<s%> among the <S%H1471>heathen,<s%> <S%H834>whither<s%> <S%H8033><s%> ye <S%H935>went.<s%>

And I will <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H8034>name,<s%> which was <S%H2490>profaned<s%> among the <S%H1471>heathen,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> ye have <S%H2490>profaned<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of them; and the <S%H1471>heathen<s%> shall <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD,<s%> when I shall be <S%H6942>sanctified<s%> in you before their <S%H5869>eyes.<s%>

For I will <S%H3947>take<s%> you from <S%H4480>among<s%> the <S%H1471>heathen,<s%> and <S%H6908>gather<s%> you out of <S%H4480>all<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H776>countries,<s%> and will <S%H935>bring<s%> you <S%H413>into<s%> your own <S%H127>land.<s%>

Then will I <S%H2236>sprinkle<s%> <S%H2889>clean<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> you, and ye shall be <S%H2891>clean:<s%> from <S%H4480>all<s%> <S%H3605><s%> your <S%H2932>filthiness,<s%> and from <S%H4480>all<s%> <S%H3605><s%> your <S%H1544>idols,<s%> will I <S%H2891>cleanse<s%> you.

A <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%> also will I <S%H5414>give<s%> you, and a <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H7307>spirit<s%> will I <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H7130>within<s%> you: and I will take <S%H5493>away<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H68>stony<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%> out of your <S%H4480>flesh,<s%> <S%H1320><s%> and I will <S%H5414>give<s%> you a <S%H3820>heart<s%> of <S%H1320>flesh.<s%>

And I will <S%H5414>put<s%> my <S%H7307>spirit<s%> <S%H7130>within<s%> you, and <S%H6213>cause<s%> you to <S%H1980>walk<s%> <S%H854>in<s%> my <S%H2706>statutes,<s%> and ye shall <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H4941>judgments,<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> them.

And ye shall <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> I <S%H5414>gave<s%> to your <S%H1>fathers;<s%> and ye shall <S%H1961>be<s%> my <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H595>I<s%> will <S%H1961>be<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>

I will also <S%H3467>save<s%> you from <S%H4480>all<s%> <S%H3605><s%> your <S%H2932>uncleannesses:<s%> and I will <S%H7121>call<s%> <S%H413>for<s%> the <S%H1715>corn,<s%> and will <S%H7235>increase<s%> it, and <S%H5414>lay<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H7458>famine<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> you.

And I will <S%H7235>multiply<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of the <S%H6086>tree,<s%> and the <S%H8570>increase<s%> of the <S%H7704>field,<s%> <S%H4616>that<s%> <S%H834><s%> ye shall <S%H3947>receive<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> <S%H2781>reproach<s%> of <S%H7458>famine<s%> among the <S%H1471>heathen.<s%>

Then shall ye <S%H2142>remember<s%> <S%H853><s%> your own <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H1870>ways,<s%> and your <S%H4611>doings<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> were <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H2896>good,<s%> and shall loathe <S%H6962>yourselves<s%> in your own <S%H6440>sight<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> your <S%H5771>iniquities<s%> and <S%H5921>for<s%> your <S%H8441>abominations.<s%>

Not <S%H3808><s%> for your <S%H4616>sakes<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> this, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD,<s%> be it <S%H3045>known<s%> unto you: be <S%H954>ashamed<s%> and <S%H3637>confounded<s%> for your own <S%H4480>ways,<s%> <S%H1870><s%> O <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> In the <S%H3117>day<s%> that I shall have <S%H2891>cleansed<s%> you from <S%H4480>all<s%> <S%H3605><s%> your <S%H5771>iniquities<s%> I will also cause you to <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H853><s%> in the <S%H5892>cities,<s%> and the <S%H2723>wastes<s%> shall be <S%H1129>built.<s%>

And the <S%H8074>desolate<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> shall be <S%H5647>tilled,<s%> <S%H8478>whereas<s%> <S%H834><s%> it <S%H1961>lay<s%> <S%H8077>desolate<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> that passed <S%H5674>by.<s%>

And they shall <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H1977>This<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> that was <S%H8074>desolate<s%> is <S%H1961>become<s%> like the <S%H1588>garden<s%> of <S%H5731>Eden;<s%> and the <S%H2720>waste<s%> and <S%H8074>desolate<s%> and <S%H2040>ruined<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> are become <S%H1219>fenced,<s%> and are <S%H3427>inhabited.<s%>

Then the <S%H1471>heathen<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> are <S%H7604>left<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%> you shall <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1129>build<s%> the <S%H2040>ruined<s%> places, and <S%H5193>plant<s%> that that was <S%H8074>desolate:<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> it, and I will <S%H6213>do<s%> it.

Thus <S%H3541><s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> I will <S%H5750>yet<s%> for <S%H2063>this<s%> be inquired <S%H1875>of<s%> by the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> it for them; I will <S%H7235>increase<s%> them with <S%H120>men<s%> like a <S%H6629>flock.<s%>

As the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H6629>flock,<s%> as the <S%H6629>flock<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> in her solemn <S%H4150>feasts;<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> shall the <S%H2720>waste<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H4392>filled<s%> with <S%H6629>flocks<s%> of <S%H120>men:<s%> and they shall <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
